original_text: You must stay at the door of the Tent of Meeting for seven days. This will make you holy. You must stay for seven days to become holy.
korean_text: 위임식은 이레 동안 행하나니 위임식이 끝나는 날까지 이레 동안은 회막 문에 나가지 말라

sentences.original_text: You must stay at the door of the Tent of Meeting
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 회막 문 앞에 머물러야 합니다

sentences.original_text: You must stay for seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 칠 일 동안 머물러야 합니다
